dialog: When shall it arrive, good sir?
It is due to arrive at the hour of 7 and thirty minutes on the morrow.
Pray tell, how much is the cost of a ticket?
The cost of a coach ticket is 86 galleons and a berth shall cost thee 175 galleons.
One berth, if you please.
Taxi, ho!
Where might you be headed, kind sir?
To the Beijing Library, if you would be so kind.
Step inside, if you please.
Is the journey to the Beijing Library a long one?
It shall take us approximately thirty minutes, for it is the hour of rush.
Thirty minutes shall suffice. Fifty minutes remain before the library shall open its doors. Observe, what are they doing in the square?
It is an exhibition of Chinese jades, held annually. A magnificent collection of jades is on display and for sale.
Sounds delightful! Could we stop for a moment? I must purchase a few trinkets for my friends.
It shall be my pleasure.
How many pieces of luggage shall you be checking in, good sir?
I shall be checking in three bags and a suitcase. This is my luggage to be checked.
Do you have any luggage to carry on?
Nay.
Place your luggage upon the scale, if you please. Ah, it seems your luggage is over the weight limit.
